凍らす: (こおらす) - to freeze; to refrigerate
凍り: (こおり) - ice; shaved ice (usually served with flavored simple syrup)
凍りつく: (こおりつく) - to freeze to/to be frozen to; to freeze in place/to be still
凍り付く: (こおりつく) - to freeze to/to be frozen to; to freeze in place/to be still
凍り餅: (こおりもち) - mochi freeze-dried in the winter air
凍る: (こおる) - to freeze; to be frozen over; to congeal
凍傷者: (とうしょうしゃ) - case of frostbite
凍死: (とうし) - death from cold; freezing to death
凍死者: (とうししゃ) - person frozen to death
凍結: (touketsu) - freezing (ex. água); freezing (prices, wages, assets, etc.), moratorium, suspension (e.g. investment)
凍結レファレンス: (とうけつレファレンス) - frozen reference
凍結乾燥: (とうけつかんそう) - freeze-drying; lyophilization
凍結卵: (とうけつらん) - frozen eggs; cryopreserved oocyte/frozen ovum
凍結卵子: (とうけつらんし) - cryopreserved oocyte; frozen ovum
凍解け: (いてどけ) - thawing of the ground in spring
凍豆腐: (しみどうふ) - frozen tofu; dried bean curd
凛: (りん) - Frio, frio, gélido, revigorante; digno
凛々しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
凛冽: (りんれつ) - biting; severe; intense; rigorous
凛凛しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
凛烈: (りんれつ) - biting; severe; intense; rigorous
凜々しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
凜凜しい: (りりしい) - gallant; brave; imposing; awe-inspiring; severe; biting; chivalrous; manly; dignified
凝った: (こった) - elaborate; exquisite; tasteful; refined; artistic
凝める: (みつめる) - to stare at; to gaze at; to look hard at; to watch intently; to fix one's eyes on
凝らす: (こらす) - to concentrate; to devote; to apply; to strain; to rack
凝らせる: (こごらせる) - to freeze; to congeal
凝り: (shikori) - muscle stiffness (especialmente nos ombros); lump (in tissue, esp. breast), swelling, hardening, lesion , muscle stiffness (esp. in shoulders); lump (in tissue, esp. breast), swelling, hardening, lesion; lingering discomfort, uneasiness, bad aftertaste, unpleasant feeling
凝りだす: (こりだす) - to be into something (ie. a hobby)
凝り出す: (こりだす) - to be into something (ie. a hobby)
凝り固まる: (こりかたまる) - to coagulate/to curdle/to clot; to be fanatical/to be obsessed with/to be bigoted; to stiffen/to become stiff
凝り性: (こりしょう) - fastidiousness/enthusiasm for one thing/meticulousness/monomania/obsession; susceptibility for a stiffening of the shoulders
凝乎と: (じいっと) - (じーっと is more emphatic. 凝乎と is rare.) motionlessly (e.g. stand, wait)/(be) still; fixedly (e.g. gaze, stare)/intently (e.g. listen, think); patiently (endure)/stoically; firmly (e.g. hold)/restrained
凝乳: (ぎょうにゅう) - curd; curds; curdled milk
凝固まり: (こりかたまり) - coagulation; clot; enthusiast; fanatic
凝固剤: (ぎょうこざい) - coagulant; coagulating agent
凝固点: (ぎょうこてん) - hardening point; freezing point; congealing point
凝然として: (ぎょうぜんとして) - quietly; without the slightest movement
凝結: (ぎょうけつ) - coagulation; freezing; solidification; curdling; setting; congealing
凝縮: (gyoushuku) - condensation (de ideias, emoções, etc.); condensation (of a vapour or gas)
凝聚: (ぎょうしゅう) - agglomeration/clumping together; cohesion (of ions, etc.); flocculation (of colloidal particles); agglutination
凝花舎: (ぎょうかしゃ) - court ladies' residence (in the inner Heian Palace)
凝華舎: (ぎょうかしゃ) - court ladies' residence (in the inner Heian Palace)
凝集: (ぎょうしゅう) - agglomeration/clumping together; cohesion (of ions, etc.); flocculation (of colloidal particles); agglutination
凝集力: (ぎょうしゅうりょく) - cohesive power
凝集反応: (ぎょうしゅうはんのう) - agglutination reaction
几下: (きか) - word of respect added to the addressee's name on a letter; under the desk
几帳面: (きちょうめん) - methodical; punctual; steady
凡そ: (およそ) - about/roughly/approximately; generally/on the whole/as a rule; completely/quite/entirely/altogether/totally/not at all (with neg. verb); outline/gist
凡その見当: (およそのけんとう) - rough estimation
凡ならざる人物: (ぼんならざるじんぶつ) - man of unusual ability; remarkable man
